bibl.title: Attestations of ἡ κοινή in BKT 10.4 (Hom. Od. 15.531-553 with Marginal Annotations).
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: B.K.T. X, 4 (= M.-P.3 1119; LDAB 1424). - Several annotations report variant readings ascribed to the text known as ἡ κοινή. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Michael Haslam, Attestations of ἡ κοινή in BKT 10.4 (Hom. Od. 15.531-553 with Marginal Annotations).
